Verses: 1 neengal Ungalukku Vikkiragangalaiyum Suroobangalaiyum Undaakkaamalum, Ungalukku Silaiyai Niruththaamalum, Siththirantheerndha Kallai Namaskarikkumporuttu Ungal Dhesaththil Vaikkaamalum Iruppeergalaaga; Naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar.
2 en Oivunaatkalai Aasariththu, En Parisuththa Sthalaththaikkuriththu Bayabakthiyaayiruppeergalaaga; Naan Karththar.
3 neengal En Kattalaigalinpadi Nadandhu, En Karpanaigalaik Kaikkondu, Avaigalinpadi Seydhaal,
4 naan Etra Kaalaththil Ungalukku Mazhaipeyyappannuven; Boomi Than Palanaiyum, Veliyilulla Marangal Thangal Kaniyaiyum Kodukkum.

5 dhraatchappazham Parikkunkaalamvaraikkum Poradippukkaalam Irukkum; Vidhaippukkaalam Varaikkum Dhraatchappazham Parikkunkaalam Irukkum; Neengal Ungal Appaththaith Thirupthiyaaga Saappittu, Ungal Dhesaththil Sugamaaik Kudiyiruppeergal.

6 dhesaththil Samaadhaanam Kattalaiyiduven; Thaththalikkappannuvaar Illaamal Paduththukkolveergal; Dhushta Mirugangalai Dhesaththil Iraadhapadikku Ozhiyappannuven; Pattayam Ungal Dhesaththil Ulaavuvadhillai.
7 ungal Saththurukkalaith Thuraththuveergal; Avargal Ungal Munbaagap Pattayaththaal Vizhuvaargal.
8 ungalil Aindhuper Nooruperaiththuraththuvaargal; Ungalil Nooruper Padhinaayiramperaith Thuraththuvaargal; Ungal Saththurukkal Ungalukku Munbaagap Pattayaththaal Vizhuvaargal.
9 naan Ungalmel Kannokkamaayirundhu, Ungalaip Palugavum Perugavumpanni, Ungalode En Udanpadikkaiyaith Thidappaduththuven.
10 ponavarushaththup Pazhaiya Dhaaniyaththai Saappittu, Pudhiya Dhaaniyaththukku Idamundaagumpadi, Pazhaiyadhai Vilakkuveergal.
11 ungal Naduvil En Vaasasthalaththai Sthaabippen; En Aaththumaa Ungalai Arosippadhillai.
12 naan Ungal Naduvile Ulaavi, Ungal Dhevanaayiruppen, Neengal En Janamaayiruppeergal.

13 neengal Egipthiyarukku Adimaigalaayiraadhapadikku, Naan Avargal Dhesaththilirundhu Ungalaip Purappadappanni, Ungal Nugaththadigalai Muriththu, Ungalai Nimirndhu Nadakkappannina Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar.
14 neengal Enakku Sevikodaamalum, Indhak Karpanaigal Ellaavatrinpadi Seyyaamalum,
15 en Kattalaigalai Veruththu, Ungal Aaththumaa En Nyaayangalai Arosiththu, En Karpanaigal Ellaavatrinpadiyum Seyyaadhapadikku, En Udanpadikkaiyai Neengal Meerippoduveergalaagil:

16 naan Ungalukku Seyvadhu Ennavendraal, Kangalaip Pooththuppogappannugiradharkum, Irudhayaththaith Thuyarappaduththugiradharkum, Thigilaiyum Eelaiyaiyum Kaaichchalaiyum Ungalukku Varappannuven; Neengal Vidhaikkum Vidhai Virudhaavaayirukkum; Ungal Saththurukkal Adhin Palanaith Thinbaargal.
17 naan Ungalukku Virodhamaaga En Mugaththaith Thiruppuven; Ungal Saththurukkalukku Munbaaga Muriya Adikkappaduveergal; Ungal Pagaignar Ungalai Aaluvaargal; Thuraththuvaar Illaadhirundhum Oduveergal.
18 ivvidhamaai Naan Ungalukku Seydhum, Innum Neengal Enakku Sevikodaadhirundhaal,ungal Paavangalinimiththam Pinnum Ezhaththanaiyaaga Ungalai Dhandiththu,
19 ungal Vallamaiyin Perumaiyai Muriththu, Ungal Vaanaththai Irumbaippolavum, Ungal Boomiyai Vengalaththaippolavum Aakkuven.
20 ungal Belan Virudhaavile Selavazhiyum; Ungal Dhesam Than Palanaiyum, Dhesaththin Marangal Thangal Kanigalaiyum Kodukkamaattaadhu.
21 neengal Enakku Sevikodukka Manadhillaamal, Enakku Edhirththu Nadappeergalaanaal, Naan Ungal Paavangalukkuth Thakkadhaaga Innum Ezhaththanai Vaadhaiyai Ungalmel Varappanni,

22 ungalukkulle Veliyin Dhushtamirugangalai Varaviduven; Avaigal Ungalaip Pillaigalatravargalaakki, Ungal Miruga Jeevangalai Azhiththu, Ungalaik Kuraindhupogappannum, Ungal Vazhigal Paazhaaikkidakkum.
23 naan Seyyum Dhandanaiyinaal Neengal Gunappadaamal, Enakku Edhirththu Nadandhaal,
24 naan Ungalukku Edhirththu Nadandhu, Ungal Paavangalinimiththam Ezhaththanaiyaaga Vaadhiththu,

25 en Udanpadikkaiyai Meerinadharkup Pazhivaangum Pattayaththai Ungalmel Varappanni, Neengal Ungal Pattanangalil Serndhapin, Kollainoyai Ungal Naduvile Anuppuven; Saththuruvin Kaiyil Oppukkodukkappaduveergal.

26 ungal Appam Ennum Aadharavukolai Naan Muriththuppodumpodhu, Paththu Sthreegal Ore Aduppil Ungal Appaththai Suttu, Adhaith Thirumba Ungalukku Niruththukkoduppaargal; Neengal Saappittum Thirupthiyadaiyamaatteergal
27 innum Ivaigal Ellaavatraalum Neengal Enakku Sevikodaamal, Enakku Edhirththu Nadandhaal,
28 naanum Ukkiraththode Ungalukku Edhirththu Nadandhu, Naane Ungal Paavangalinimiththam Ungalai Ezhaththanaiyaai Dhandippen.
29 ungal Kumaararin Maamsaththaiyum Ungal Kumaaraththiyin Maamsaththaiyum Pusippeergal.
30 naan Ungal Medaigalai Azhiththu, Ungal Vikkiraga Silaigalai Nirththooliyaakki, Ungal Udalgalai Ungal Naragalaana Dhevargaludaiya Udalgalmel Eriven; En Aaththumaa Ungalai Arosikkum.
31 naan Ungal Pattanangalai Verumaiyum, Ungal Parisuththa Sthalangalaip Paazhumaakki, Ungal Sugandha Vaasanaiyai Mugaraadhiruppen.
32 naan Dhesaththaip Paazhaakkuven; Adhile Kudiyirukkira Ungal Saththurukkal Bramippaargal.
33 jaadhigalukkulle Ungalai Sidhara Adiththu, Ungal Pinnaagap Pattayaththai Uruvuven; Ungal Dhesam Paazhum, Ungal Pattanangal Vanaandharamumaagum.

34 neengal Ungal Saththurukkalin Dhesaththil Irukkumpodhu, Dhesamaanadhu Paazhaaikkidakkira Naalellaam Than Oivunaatkalai Rammiyamaai Anubavikkum; Appozhudhu Dhesam Oivadaindhu, Than Oivunaatkalai Rammiyamaai Anubavikkum;
35 neengal Adhile Kudiyirukkumpodhu, Adhu Ungal Oivu Varushangalil Oivadaiyaadhapadiyinaale, Adhu Paazhaaikkidakkum Naalellaam Oivadaindhirukkum.

36 ungalil Uyirodu Meedhiyaayiruppavargalin Irudhayangal Thangal Saththurukkalin Dhesangalil Manaththalarchchiyadaiyumpadi Seyven; Asaigira Ilaiyin Saththamum Avargalai Ottum; Avargal Pattayaththirkuth Thappi Odugiradhupola Odi, Thuraththuvaar Illaamal Vizhuvaargal.
37 thuraththuvaar Illaamal, Pattayaththukku Mun Vizhuvadhupola, Oruvarmel Oruvar Idari Vizhuvaargal; Ungal Saththurukkalukkumun Nirka Ungalukku Belan Iraadhu.
38 purajaadhigalukkulle Azhindhupoveergal; Ungal Saththurukkalin Dhesam Ungalaip Patchikkum.
39 ungalil Thappinavargal Thangal Akkiramangalinimiththamum, Thangal Pidhaakkalin Akkiramangalinimiththamum, Ungal Saththurukkalin Dhesangalil Vaadippovaargal.
40 avargal Enakku Virodhamaaga Dhrogampanni Nadappiththa Thangal Akkiramaththaiyum, Thangal Pidhaakkalin Akkiramaththaiyum ArikkaiyidugiradhumandriÂ ,

41 avargal Enakku Edhirththu Nadandhapadiyinaal, Naanum Avargalukku Edhirththu Nadandhu, Avargaludaiya Saththurukkalin Dhesaththile Avargalaik Kondupoivittadhaiyum Arikkaiyittu, Viruththasedhanamillaadha Thangal Irudhayaththaith Thaazhththi, Thangal Akkiramaththukkuk Kidaiththa Dhandanaiyai Nyaayam Endru Oththukkondaal,
42 naan Yaakkobode Pannina En Udanpadikkaiyaiyum, Eesaakkode Pannina En Udanpadikkaiyaiyum, Aabiragaamode Pannina En Udanpadikkaiyaiyum Ninaippen; Dhesaththaiyum Ninaippen.

43 dhesam Avargalaale Vidappattu, Paazhaaikkidakkiradhinaale Than Oivunaatkalai Rammiyamaai Anubavikkum; Avargal En Nyaayangalai Avamadhiththu, Avargaludaiya Aaththumaa En Kattalaigalai Veruththapadiyinaal Adaindha Thangaludaiya Akkiramaththin Dhandanaiyai Nyaayam Endru Oththukkolluvaargal.

44 avargal Thangal Saththurukkalin Dhesaththilirundhaalum, Naan Avargalai Nirmoolamaakkaththakkadhaagavum, Naan Avargalode Pannina En Udanpadikkaiyai Abaththamaakkaththakkadhaagavum, Naan Avargalaik Kaividavum Verukkavumaatten; Naan Avargal Dhevanaagiya Karththar.

45 avargaludaiya Dhevanaayirukkumpadikku, Naan Purajaadhigalin Kangalukku Munbaaga Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Avargalaip Purappadachcheydhu, Avargaludaiya Munnorgalode Naan Pannina Udanpadikkaiyai Avargal Nimiththam Ninaivukooruven; Naan Karththar Endru Sol Endraar.
46 karththar Thamakkum Isravel Sandhadhiyaarukkum Naduve Irukkumpadi Moseyaikkondu, Seenaaimalaiyinmel Koduththa Kattalaigalum Nyaayangalum Ivaigale.
